duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform administrative and clinical duties under the direction of a physician or nurse manager
Scribe patient notes and maintain patient charts, including filing reports and lab results
Measure vital signs, confirm patient information, educate patients, and assist with treatment plans
Complete necessary forms, manage patient records, and respond to inquiries and requests for information
Maintain exam rooms, respond to emails and calls, and communicate status updates regarding patients and treatment plans

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or its equivalent
